Claim: "Recent warming is producing crop production records."
Implication: "There are billions of dollars in new economic and human welfare benefits each year."
Referring expressions: Recent warming, crop production records.  dollars, new economic benefits, new human welfare benefits, each year.
Properties: IsRecent(a),  HasCropProductionRecords(b)  IsInDollars(c),  HasNewEconomicBenefits(d),  HasNewHumanWelfareBenefits(e),  IsEachYear(f)
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsRecent(a) and HasCropProductionRecords(b)))) -> (exists e (exists c (exists f (exists d (IsInDollars(c) and (HasNewEconomicBenefits(d) and HasNewHumanWelfareBenefits(e)) and IsEachYear(f))))))
